response.overview: Juliette, a young woman who was once the victim of an acid attack, is slowly trying to rebuild her life. To try to accept her new face, she decides to go out on Halloween night to blend in with the crowd. But she ends up panicking, and sits down to calm down. Then she meets Arthur, a little boy who is convinced that he has much bigger problems...
response.title: De Vitry aux Batignolles
